summary: 2005  was a common year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: "Photograph" is a song recorded by Canadian rock band Nickelback. It was released in September 2005 as the first single from their fifth studio album, All the Right Reasons. The song made multiple US and UK top 10 charts, peaking at #1 in several of them.
title: Photograph (Nickelback song)
